statements: UPDATE FoodWasteData SET amount_wasted = 50.25, date = '2023-06-15' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE FoodWasteData SET location = 'Kitchen', amount_purchased = 100.00 WHERE id = 2
UPDATE FoodWasteData SET amount_wasted = amount_wasted + 2.5 WHERE location = 'Kitchen' AND date = '2022-09-15' AND amount_purchased > 0
UPDATE FoodWasteData SET amount_wasted = 0.0, amount_purchased = amount_purchased + 10.0 WHERE food_item = 'Apples' AND location = 'Pantry'
UPDATE FoodWasteData SET quantity = 50 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE WasteAnalysis SET quantity_wasted = 100, waste_category = 'Organic' WHERE analysis_id = 3;
UPDATE FoodWasteData SET quantity = 10, date_added = '2021-10-15' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE WasteAnalysis SET quantity_wasted = 50, waste_category = 'Expired Food', analysis_date = '2021-11-20' WHERE analysis_id = 5;
UPDATE food_waste_data SET waste_amount = 50.25 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE waste_categories SET category_description = 'Information on waste categories' WHERE category_id = 2;
UPDATE food_waste_data SET waste_amount = 50.75, date_recorded = '2022-09-15' WHERE id = 101;
UPDATE waste_categories SET category_description = 'Environmental impact of food waste' WHERE category_id = 3;
UPDATE FoodWasteData SET Quantity = 50, ProductName = 'Apples' WHERE ID = 1;
UPDATE WasteTrends SET Frequency = 'High', Impact = 'Severe' WHERE TrendID = 2;
UPDATE FoodWasteData SET Quantity = Quantity + 5 WHERE ID = 1;
UPDATE WasteLocations SET Address = '123 Main Street' WHERE LocationID = 2;
UPDATE FoodWasteData SET quantity = 20.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE WasteAnalysis SET waste_quantity = 30 WHERE analysis_id = 2;
UPDATE FoodCategories SET description = 'New Description' WHERE category_id = 1;
